attribute.name: onOutcome
attribute.description: end the conversation only if the action outcome matches the given onOutcome. This can be a comma separated list.

attribute.name: errorOutcome
attribute.description: on exception use the given outcome for further navigation

attribute.name: restart
attribute.description: true|false|valueBinding - true if the conversation should be restarted immediately

attribute.name: restartAction
attribute.description: the action which should be called in case of a restart
